name: speechkit-audio-player-v2
description: A web player component that can play audio from https://speechkit.io

scripts.publish:rc: yarn lerna publish --canary --dist-tag release-candidate --preid rc.$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)
scripts.develop: yarn run clear && cd packages/player && yarn run develop
scripts.develop:lib: yarn run clear && cd packages/player && yarn run develop:lib
scripts.develop:ie11: yarn run clear && cd packages/player && yarn run develop:ie11
scripts.build: yarn run clear && cd packages/player && yarn run build
scripts.build:module: yarn run clear && cd packages/player && yarn run build:module
scripts.build:lib: yarn run clear && cd packages/player && yarn run build:lib
scripts.storybook:build: yarn run build:lib && cd packages/demo && yarn run build-storybook

author: Zapozdaev Anton <azapozdaev@meyvndigital.co.uk>
